has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: EVENT_ATTRIBUTES
metadata.comment: This table cleans and transform attributes from each event in the events table.

ATTRIBUTE_ID.name: ATTRIBUTE_ID
ATTRIBUTE_ID.comment: ID for the attribute, which is a concatenation of tx_id-event_index-attribute_index.

EVENT_ID.name: EVENT_ID
EVENT_ID.comment: The id for the event, which is a concatenation of tx_id-event_index.

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time for when the block was written.

EVENT_INDEX.name: EVENT_INDEX
EVENT_INDEX.comment: The index of the event within the transaction, i.e. in what order the events occurred.

ATTRIBUTE_INDEX.name: ATTRIBUTE_INDEX
ATTRIBUTE_INDEX.comment: Index of the attribute within the event, corresponds with how the attributes are presented on the explorer.

EVENT_CONTRACT.name: EVENT_CONTRACT
EVENT_CONTRACT.comment: The contract called for this event. This is equivalent to the Contract column on Flowscan.

EVENT_TYPE.name: EVENT_TYPE
EVENT_TYPE.comment: The type of method called on the event_contract. This is equivalent to the Type column on Flowscan.

ATTRIBUTE_KEY.name: ATTRIBUTE_KEY
ATTRIBUTE_KEY.comment: The key of the attribute key-value pair. This is the label while attribute_value is the data.

DECODED_ADDRESS.name: DECODED_ADDRESS
DECODED_ADDRESS.comment: The decoded address, if applicable, for the attribute_value.

ATTRIBUTE_VALUE.name: ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
ATTRIBUTE_VALUE.comment: The value of the attribute key-value pair. This is the data that attribute_key labels.

ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ADJ.name: ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ADJ
ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ADJ.comment: The adjusted attribute_value where an address from decoded_address is used in place of the encoded binary string, where applicable.

_INGESTED_AT.name: _INGESTED_AT
_INGESTED_AT.comment: When the record was ingested by the chainwalker.

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

clustering_key.label: Clustering Key
clustering_key.description: The key used to cluster this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: TRANSACTIONS
metadata.comment: This table records all the transactions of the FLOW blockchain.

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time for when the block was written.

BLOCK_HEIGHT.name: BLOCK_HEIGHT
BLOCK_HEIGHT.comment: The block height the block was recorded at.

CHAIN_ID.name: CHAIN_ID
CHAIN_ID.comment: The id for the chain of the network on which this block occurred.

PAYER.name: PAYER
PAYER.comment: Address of the wallet paying for the transaction.

GAS_LIMIT.name: GAS_LIMIT
GAS_LIMIT.comment: Upper gas limit attached to the transaction.

TRANSACTION_RESULT.name: TRANSACTION_RESULT
TRANSACTION_RESULT.comment: Outcome of the transaction, including events that were called.

TX_SUCCEEDED.name: TX_SUCCEEDED
TX_SUCCEEDED.comment: Transaction status, if it succeeded or failed.

_INGESTED_AT.name: _INGESTED_AT
_INGESTED_AT.comment: When the record was ingested by the chainwalker.

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

clustering_key.label: Clustering Key
clustering_key.description: The key used to cluster this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: BLOCKS
metadata.comment: Information about blocks on the FLOW network and corresponding metadata.

BLOCK_HEIGHT.name: BLOCK_HEIGHT
BLOCK_HEIGHT.comment: The block height the block was recorded at.

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time for when the block was written.

NETWORK.name: NETWORK
NETWORK.comment: The blockchain network the block or transaction occurred on.

CHAIN_ID.name: CHAIN_ID
CHAIN_ID.comment: The id for the chain of the network on which this block occurred.

TX_COUNT.name: TX_COUNT
TX_COUNT.comment: The number of transactions in the block.

PARENT_ID.name: PARENT_ID
PARENT_ID.comment: The block hash for the parent block.

_INGESTED_AT.name: _INGESTED_AT
_INGESTED_AT.comment: When the record was ingested by the chainwalker.

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

clustering_key.label: Clustering Key
clustering_key.description: The key used to cluster this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: EVENTS
metadata.comment: This table records events from each transaction on the FLOW blockchain.

EVENT_ID.name: EVENT_ID
EVENT_ID.comment: The id for the event, which is a concatenation of tx_id-event_index.

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The date and time for when the block was written.

BLOCK_HEIGHT.name: BLOCK_HEIGHT
BLOCK_HEIGHT.comment: The block height the block was recorded at.

TX_SUCCEEDED.name: TX_SUCCEEDED
TX_SUCCEEDED.comment: Transaction status, if it succeeded or failed.

EVENT_INDEX.name: EVENT_INDEX
EVENT_INDEX.comment: The index of the event within the transaction, i.e. in what order the events occurred.

EVENT_CONTRACT.name: EVENT_CONTRACT
EVENT_CONTRACT.comment: The contract called for this event. This is equivalent to the Contract column on Flowscan.

EVENT_TYPE.name: EVENT_TYPE
EVENT_TYPE.comment: The type of method called on the event_contract. This is equivalent to the Type column on Flowscan.

EVENT_DATA.name: EVENT_DATA
EVENT_DATA.comment: The raw event data from the event.

_EVENT_DATA_FIELDS.name: _EVENT_DATA_FIELDS
_EVENT_DATA_FIELDS.comment: The fields object from the event_data.

_INGESTED_AT.name: _INGESTED_AT
_INGESTED_AT.comment: When the record was ingested by the chainwalker.

bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

clustering_key.description: The key used to cluster this table

has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table
